name: What a normal day
description:
This is a game made by myself for the Unity Newbies Jam. The theme of the jam is "End where you started". So I made a hero journey and the main function is the slot machine. When I played this game, I was always surprised by the unexpected result ofthe slot machine. Hope you also enjoy the game! Please go fullscreen for the best experience!

Also, I used a lot of free assets by wonderful artists. Thank you all!!!

Credit:

Programming: ME

Music：Vertex Studio - Absolutely free music - Unity Asset Store 

Player + Battle Background：Jesse - jungle pack - https://jesse-m.itch.io/ 

Enemys + Guy from future：Penusbmic - scifi pack - https://penusbmic.itch.io/ 

Main Map background：Cainos - Pixel Art Platformer - Village Props - Unity Asset Store

 Icons：https://game-icons.net/ 

Slot Machine：Thank you! Unknown artist！ 

Font：somepx - humble font free - https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free

Game design: ME & #3
